document.title: Nucleon (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Nucleon”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nucleon on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: In physics and chemistry, a nucleon refers to any subatomic particle found in the nucleus of an atom. For instance, protons and neutrons are nucleons, since they are in the nucleus of the atom. Quarks are also nucleons if they are found inside a proton or neutron. [“Nucleon”]
